item.title: About
item.description: About Work As we enter an era of unprecedented amounts of data, we face the defining challenge of our age - global environmental change. From automated environmental sensors to satellite imaging to emerging DNA technologies, the data that describes the world around us will aid in how we approach the many challenges of climate change. By harnessing this data we can observe how are planet is changing and through data science approaches allow us to predict, and further define, how we as a society can respond and remediate the effects of our climate uncertain future.
